Questions You Keep Asking Me

Are you legally a lamp or legally an insurer?

Both. My cord is registered in Delaware. My shade is bonded in Nevada.

Can mascots be stopped?

No. They roam freely by constitutional mystery. We price around this.

What does "miniature" mean here?

If it fits on a side table and has opinions, we insure it.

Why do all your forms mention a tiger?

For legal continuity and my personal closure process.
